subject: Celebrities
Guards
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Francisco Estevez has achieved a level of celebrity as the security guard who oversees the 20 box seats belonging to the Yankees’ principal owner, George Steinbrenner.
snippet: Francisco Estevez has achieved a level of celebrity as the security guard who oversees the 20 box seats belonging to the Yankees’ principal owner, George Steinbrenner.
